alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Pulaski; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 9:09PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Estill, northeastern Pulaski, northwestern Jackson and Rockcastle Counties through 945 PM EST... At 909 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Linville, or over Mount Vernon, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Boone, Goochland, Disputanta, Climax, Johnetta, Threelinks, Bummer, Snider, Roundstone, and Conway around 915 PM EST. Clover Bottom around 920 PM EST. Shirley around 925 PM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Blackburn. THIS INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING HIGHWAYS... Interstate 75 in east central Kentucky between mile markers 52 and 72. Kentucky Highway 80 in Pulaski County between mile markers 37 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
